data.actual_result: The message from the other user do not group until you switch out of the channel and back in after you have sent a message
data.expected_result: The messages from the other user are supposed to group
data.short_description: Messages from the same user fail to group if the red new messages bar is between them and disappears
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel with another user - Have the user send a message or two while you are actively viewing the channel on your phone (make sure you do not have any other devices set to this channel) - After the user sends a message or two, switch to a second channel and have the user send a message in the first channel (easier if you have another channel to communicate in while testing) - After they have sent another message or two, go back into the first channel - Make sure their messages are separated by the red "New Messages" line, and then send a message in that channel - After sending a message, observe the messages that the user had sent
